entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who finished a sentence for someone else. He used his wand to make a bullfrog swell up like a green balloon.

entities.name: azka ban
entities.description: Azka Ban is a location where Harry would probably be back in the morning.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who used her wand to silence Harry's bullfrog with the spell 'Silencio'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is trying to cast the spell Silencio on his raven.

entities.name: bullfrog
entities.description: The bullfrog was made to swell up like a green balloon by Harry's wand.

entities.name: raven
entities.description: A raven is an animal that let out a derisive caw when Ron tried to cast the spell Silencio on it.

entities.name: owl
entities.description: An owl is an animal that can be used for sending messages.

relationships.description: Harry would probably be back in Azka Ban this morning.
Hermione used her wand to silence Harry's bullfrog with the spell 'Silencio'.
Ron tried to cast the spell Silencio on his raven.
Hermione corrected Ron's wand movement while he was trying to cast the spell Silencio.
